metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13419 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue has been found in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is a memory leak in psf_allocate in common.c, as demonstrated by sndfile-convert. NOTE: The maintainer and third parties were unable to reproduce and closed the issue.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue could not be reproduced, upstream has closed this bug marking as ignored

criterions.comment: libsndfile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
